item.title: Is the stock market open on MLK Day? Does the post office deliver mail?
item.description: Today’s holiday commemorates the birth of civil rights leader Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: As competition heats up, OpenAI changes course and introduces ads on ChatGPT
item.description: Confronted with fierce competition from its rivals and immense funding requirements in the next few years, Altman announced ads on ChatGPT.

item.title: A year after his death, Gene Hackman’s longtime Santa Fe home is listed for $6.25 million
item.description: Actor Gene Hackman’s longtime New Mexico compound has hit the market, a year after he and his wife, Betsy Arakawa, were found dead inside the home.

item.title: Stock futures lead global markets sharply lower and gold hits fresh record as Trump threatens tariffs on Europe over Greenland
item.description: Concerns European nations will retaliate raises fears of more trade turmoil

item.title: Trump plans 10% tariffs on European countries over Greenland: What it means for markets.
item.description: Trump levels latest threat at Europe as Supreme Court decision on his tariffs loom
